## Introduction

This is a default template for the `quafira` custom quarto format.

You can learn more about `quafira` in its
[Github repository](https://github.com/francisbarton/quafira)

quafira is based on [bookup](https://github.com/juba/bookup-html) by Julien
Barnier.
Thanks Julien!

You can learn more about controlling the appearance of HTML output at the
[quarto website](https://quarto.org/docs/output-formats/html-basics.html).
